title: Legends in the mist
caption: Bran Castle in Bran, Brașov, Romania
copyright: Entrance of Bran Castle in Bran, Brașov, Romania (© blue sky in my pocket/Getty Images)
copyrightOnly: © blue sky in my pocket/Getty Images
description: Centuries ago, in parts of ancient Europe, the night marking the end of the harvest and beginning of winter was feared as a time when the worlds of the living and the dead overlapped. Communities lit fires to keep wandering spirits at bay, believing that on this night the boundary between the two faded. These rituals gave rise to Halloween, echoing in legends around Bran Castle.
